name: Dungeon Architect
description:
Dive in to a single-player campaign, where you’ll need to build a colony and form an economy around dungeon exploration on unique islands with difficult objectives to attract guests. 

Prepare for attacks from the dungeon monster that escape, floods that swallow to island, quakes that destroy building, guest upset and forest fires that can destroy your chance at success. 

Craft weapons, potions and customize your character. Finally, when your ready take part in an expedition to the world below the surface in dungeons and earn gold, experience and crystals from defeating monsters.
